reviewer_info: Posted by Nouman Sarfraz on Mar 23, 2021
review_text:
good budget car with excellent fuel average of 17 in city & 19 on long. 
it's a 4 cylinder car & I traveled in it on long routs as well without any heat up issues. 
body is solid as compare to other Japanese car, however one issue I found is ground clearance which I solved by putting 13" alloy rims. 
in this budget I found it a paradise to have.

review_text:
